release.name: v1.0.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Templates packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Templates.WebApi](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Templates.WebApi/1.0.0): ```shell > dotnet new --install Arcus.Templates.WebApi::1.0.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Templates packages see the [documentation](https://templates.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to create an EventHubs worker project template with integrated message pump (#680) * Provide the capability to create an Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project template (#681) * Provide the capability to create isolated/in-process Azure Functions EventHubs trigger projects * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project * Provide the capability to create isolated Azure Functions Service Bus topic trigger projects (#414) * Provide the capability to track requests in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#312) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#598) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions Databricks job metrics project template (#597) * Provide the capability to navigate automatically towards the Swagger UI page when OpenAPI is enabled in the Web API project template (#694) ### Fixes / Changes * Provide a default `ARCUS_HTTP_PORT` to the Web API project template (#683) * Assign correlation information to telemetry context in Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template to support service-to-service correlation (#612) * Use dedicated API health report model to omit exception details from the public HTTP endpoint (#600) * Use Application Insights connection string instead of instrumentation key in all project templates (with exception of in-process Azure Functions) (#594) * Updates all project templates with Observability v2.5 (#623) * Streamline Serilog default log verbosity to `Information` (#624) * Remove the OpenAPI-specific files in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template when the OpenAPI is excluded (#616) ## Changes: * f74d1ffb394d57780cfe3ccec6896872560f65fc feat: add exclude serilog project option to az func databricks jobmetrics project template (#687) * ae28413759abc6dad255a10455d2dcf60d48deab chore: add launchUrl to webapi project template (#695) * 9d72d5bdae683cd2f85f2baa942e87330c264d58 chore(deps): bump nth-check and @slorber/static-site-generator-webpack-plugin (#693) * b15bf8825135e5ff63c2b89afab65f1ff02c3175 chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.azure.functions.worker.extensions.servicebus to v5.7.0 (#692) * fc395b56a9de15b875c4ba7bedfd99cd7adb3bc4 chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.azure.functions.worker to v1.10.0 (#691) * afb9b6a9014e818ed6ff05deb3f2e7fbd8501676 docs: add introduction page (#689) * 9b2378a2fd18302089c9580302dc6337b310e560 chore(deps): update dependency arcus.security.providers.azurekeyvault to v1.8.1 (#690) * a98001ec7a0207b44dd52121a9271ec0fd70b32c feat: add az func eventhubs project template (#686) * 959fd9520522eaf9e034a95ffbee49a65484f06f feat: add isolated az func servicebus topic project option (#685) * fa7ae9743654ac049b70a2d612b962893077d00b chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.net.test.sdk to v17.3.2 (#688)

release.name: v1.3.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Messaging packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus/1.3.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus --Version 1.3.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Messaging packages see the [documentation](https://messaging.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to handle messages from Azure Event Hubs in a message pump (#24, #323, #324, #326, #335) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Service Bus messages (#309) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Event Hubs event messages (#324) * Provide the capability to track Azure Service Bus requests in the Azure Service Bus message pump (#221) * Provide the capability to create `ServiceBusMessage` instances with a fluent builder (#269) * Provide the capability to create `EventData` instances with a fluent builder (#324) * Provide the capability to route messages in .NET 6 Azure Functions (#249) * Provide the capability to retrieve the operation parent ID from the message correlation extension (#269) ### Fixes / Changes * Use custom `HealthReport` for TCP health probe that doesn't include exception details (#287) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * acfaf3ecd30333238fdb3d1e717725ca6f32dd9f feat: add eventhubs request tracking (#335) * b75dcf1b2eccb997d49bf386050ad0513e7e4f50 docs: remove table of contents (#336) * 2bf9aae80312649214c072713a8e6e148033ab8b fix: use general correlation model in sender extensions (#334) * 598b4df1f7c92235634bf9be514b3dc1f4e9401d feat: add eventhubs message router options (#332) * b88b45006e72a3bfd23620d1b0d1eaf6d8177407 test: add eventhubs docker integration test (#322) * ae653a6b8a9b0ae65d6af8a588283967026d663c feat: add telemetrycontext in sender correlation options (#328) * 15f6bdfa1d3c87c379144037bbcbf29d28aea324 feat: add dependency tracking event producing (#325) * 7b6f7f9a725fad9794805981d0a82cb50186e744 feat: add eventhubs messagehandler overloads (#323) * 00783d3ea4c8b3112adb210d19f54f9b3f8a99db feat: add request tracking az servicebus general routing (#319) * 3eedd16db475e106de7d5f759bb7d193632f30d4 chore: fix typo in xml code docs on secret store ref (#329)

* 54e0c2c17d88d19a77365324fb481cd420272ab0 chore: improve cancellation handling (#313) * be2998686dcc7b2d93ce143b2c97556267c58191 fix: use correct repo url in projects (#314) * release.name: v1.0.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Templates packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Templates.WebApi](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Templates.WebApi/1.0.0): ```shell > dotnet new --install Arcus.Templates.WebApi::1.0.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Templates packages see the [documentation](https://templates.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to create an EventHubs worker project template with integrated message pump (#680) * Provide the capability to create an Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project template (#681) * Provide the capability to create isolated/in-process Azure Functions EventHubs trigger projects * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project * Provide the capability to create isolated Azure Functions Service Bus topic trigger projects (#414) * Provide the capability to track requests in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#312) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#598) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions Databricks job metrics project template (#597) * Provide the capability to navigate automatically towards the Swagger UI page when OpenAPI is enabled in the Web API project template (#694) ### Fixes / Changes * Provide a default `ARCUS_HTTP_PORT` to the Web API project template (#683) * Assign correlation information to telemetry context in Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template to support service-to-service correlation (#612) * Use dedicated API health report model to omit exception details from the public HTTP endpoint (#600) * Use Application Insights connection string instead of instrumentation key in all project templates (with exception of in-process Azure Functions) (#594) * Updates all project templates with Observability v2.5 (#623) * Streamline Serilog default log verbosity to `Information` (#624) * Remove the OpenAPI-specific files in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template when the OpenAPI is excluded (#616) ## release.name: v1.3.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Messaging packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus/1.3.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus --Version 1.3.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Messaging packages see the [documentation](https://messaging.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? Install the Arcus.Templates packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Templates.WebApi](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Templates.WebApi/1.0.0): ```shell > dotnet new --install Arcus.Templates.WebApi::1.0.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Templates packages see the [documentation](https://templates.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to create an EventHubs worker project template with integrated message pump (#680) * Provide the capability to create an Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project template (#681) * Provide the capability to create isolated/in-process Azure Functions EventHubs trigger projects * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions EventHubs trigger project * Provide the capability to create isolated Azure Functions Service Bus topic trigger projects (#414) * Provide the capability to track requests in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#312) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template (#598) * Provide the capability to exclude Serilog from the Azure Functions Databricks job metrics project template (#597) * Provide the capability to navigate automatically towards the Swagger UI page when OpenAPI is enabled in the Web API project template (#694) ### Fixes / Changes * Provide a default `ARCUS_HTTP_PORT` to the Web API project template (#683) * Assign correlation information to telemetry context in Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template to support service-to-service correlation (#612) * Use dedicated API health report model to omit exception details from the public HTTP endpoint (#600) * Use Application Insights connection string instead of instrumentation key in all project templates (with exception of in-process Azure Functions) (#594) * Updates all project templates with Observability v2.5 (#623) * Streamline Serilog default log verbosity to `Information` (#624) * Remove the OpenAPI-specific files in the Azure Functions HTTP trigger project template when the OpenAPI is excluded (#616) ## Changes: * f74d1ffb394d57780cfe3ccec6896872560f65fc feat: add exclude serilog project option to az func databricks jobmetrics project template (#687) * ae28413759abc6dad255a10455d2dcf60d48deab chore: add launchUrl to webapi project template (#695) * 9d72d5bdae683cd2f85f2baa942e87330c264d58 chore(deps): bump nth-check and @slorber/static-site-generator-webpack-plugin (#693) * b15bf8825135e5ff63c2b89afab65f1ff02c3175 chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.azure.functions.worker.extensions.servicebus to v5.7.0 (#692) * fc395b56a9de15b875c4ba7bedfd99cd7adb3bc4 chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.azure.functions.worker to v1.10.0 (#691) * afb9b6a9014e818ed6ff05deb3f2e7fbd8501676 docs: add introduction page (#689) * 9b2378a2fd18302089c9580302dc6337b310e560 chore(deps): update dependency arcus.security.providers.azurekeyvault to v1.8.1 (#690) * a98001ec7a0207b44dd52121a9271ec0fd70b32c feat: add az func eventhubs project template (#686) * 959fd9520522eaf9e034a95ffbee49a65484f06f feat: add isolated az func servicebus topic project option (#685) * fa7ae9743654ac049b70a2d612b962893077d00b chore(deps): update dependency microsoft.net.test.sdk to v17.3.2 (#688)

release.body:
Install the Arcus.WebApi packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.WebApi.Security](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.WebApi.Security/1.7.0-preview-2):

PM > Install-Package Arcus.WebApi.Security --Version 1.7.0-preview-2
```
For a complete list of all Arcus.WebApi packages see the [documentation](https://webapi.arcus-azure.net/).
## What's new?

* Provide the capability to do something (#123)
### Fixes / Changes
None.

None.

None.

release.name: v1.3.0
release.body:
Install the Arcus.Messaging packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus/1.3.0): ```shell PM > Install-Package Arcus.Messaging.Pumps.ServiceBus --Version 1.3.0 ``` For a complete list of all Arcus.Messaging packages see the [documentation](https://messaging.arcus-azure.net/). ## What's new? ### Features * Provide the capability to handle messages from Azure Event Hubs in a message pump (#24, #323, #324, #326, #335) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Service Bus messages (#309) * Provide the capability to send correlated Azure Event Hubs event messages (#324) * Provide the capability to track Azure Service Bus requests in the Azure Service Bus message pump (#221) * Provide the capability to create `ServiceBusMessage` instances with a fluent builder (#269) * Provide the capability to create `EventData` instances with a fluent builder (#324) * Provide the capability to route messages in .NET 6 Azure Functions (#249) * Provide the capability to retrieve the operation parent ID from the message correlation extension (#269) ### Fixes / Changes * Use custom `HealthReport` for TCP health probe that doesn't include exception details (#287) ### Breaking Changes None. ### Removal None. ## Changes: * acfaf3ecd30333238fdb3d1e717725ca6f32dd9f feat: add eventhubs request tracking (#335) * b75dcf1b2eccb997d49bf386050ad0513e7e4f50 docs: remove table of contents (#336) * 2bf9aae80312649214c072713a8e6e148033ab8b fix: use general correlation model in sender extensions (#334) * 598b4df1f7c92235634bf9be514b3dc1f4e9401d feat: add eventhubs message router options (#332) * b88b45006e72a3bfd23620d1b0d1eaf6d8177407 test: add eventhubs docker integration test (#322) * ae653a6b8a9b0ae65d6af8a588283967026d663c feat: add telemetrycontext in sender correlation options (#328) * 15f6bdfa1d3c87c379144037bbcbf29d28aea324 feat: add dependency tracking event producing (#325) * 7b6f7f9a725fad9794805981d0a82cb50186e744 feat: add eventhubs messagehandler overloads (#323) * 00783d3ea4c8b3112adb210d19f54f9b3f8a99db feat: add request tracking az servicebus general routing (#319) * 3eedd16db475e106de7d5f759bb7d193632f30d4 chore: fix typo in xml code docs on secret store ref (#329)

release.name: v1.7.0-preview-1
release.body:
Install the Arcus.WebApi packages that you need via NuGet, for instance [Arcus.WebApi.Security](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Arcus.WebApi.Security/1.7.0-preview-1):
```shell
PM > Install-Package Arcus.WebApi.Security --Version 1.7.0-preview-1
```
For a complete list of all Arcus.WebApi packages see the [documentation](https://webapi.arcus-azure.net/).
## What's new?
### Features
* Provide the capability to do something (#123)
### Fixes / Changes
None.
### Breaking Changes
None.
### Removal
None.

* 02ef8561333da744ceefc55f5851fda6152ce2ed feat: add support for versioned secrets in shared access key auth (#380)

* a640815c2c5ef7709745bf74112d1fab226620da docs: use correct example package in README (#379)
* 447974fa7bcfd0203d6f4c4528ebb41337204e86 feat: add http correlation support for isolated az func (#373)
* f5c1fc4c5712b5363af6d4e00e49592ea0fbcaf8 docs: add shared access key w keyvault integration user guide (#374)
